title: amapGeocode Development Guide
text: amapGeocode R package provides interface AutoNavi Maps (Amap) API geocoding reverse geocoding. prioritizes performance reliability using httr2 robust HTTP requests tibble tidy data manipulation.

title: amapGeocode Development Guide
text: Language: R (>= 4.1.0) Documentation: roxygen2 Testing: testthat CI: GitHub Actions (R-CMD-check)

title: amapGeocode Development Guide
text: Run tests: Run specific test file: Run specific test case (filter): Run full package check (CRAN standard): Check code coverage:
code: devtools::test() testthat::test_file("tests/testthat/test-getCoord.R") devtools::test(filter = "pattern") devtools::check() # or strict check used in CI rcmdcheck::rcmdcheck(args = c("--no-manual", "--as-cran")) covr::report()

title: amapGeocode Development Guide
text: Load package state (Simulate install): Regenerate documentation (man/ files): Install dependencies:
code: devtools::load_all() # Cmd+Shift+L / Ctrl+Shift+L devtools::document() # Cmd+Shift+D / Ctrl+Shift+D remotes::install_deps(dependencies = TRUE)

title: amapGeocode Development Guide
text: Indentation: 2 spaces. Never use tabs. Assignment: Always use <- assignment, =. Braces: Opening brace line. else line closing brace.
code: if (condition) {   # code } else {   # code }

title: amapGeocode Development Guide
text: Public Functions: Mixed camelCase (historical reasons, e.g., getCoord, getLocation, extractAdmin). New public functions generally follow maintain consistency. Internal Functions: snake_case (e.g., normalize_geocode_response, perform_request). Arguments: snake_case (e.g., keep_bad_request, chunk_size, output). Variables: snake_case.

title: amapGeocode Development Guide
text: Use dplyr::bind_rows combining results. Use dplyr::arrange/dplyr::select ordering column selection. Ensure output = "tibble" default behavior.

title: amapGeocode Development Guide
text: Explicit Calls: Use package::function() imported dependencies (e.g., rlang::inform, jsonlite::fromJSON). Exceptions: add many tidyverse helpers, consider adding explicit imports NAMESPACE reduce :: noise.

title: amapGeocode Development Guide
text: API Errors: Use tryCatch handle API failures gracefully. stop entire batch single failure. Return NA placeholder rows failed items input/output lengths match. Use rlang::inform() warnings/messages. Conditions: Use amap_api_error class structured error reporting.

title: amapGeocode Development Guide
text: Documentation: change function signature, run devtools::document() immediately update man/. Tests: Add tests new features tests/testthat/. News: Update NEWS.md user-facing changes.

title: amapGeocode Development Guide
text: GitHub Actions run R-CMD-check Windows, macOS, Ubuntu. Ensure changes pass devtools::check() locally pushing.

title: Introduction to amapGeocode
text: start geocoding reverse geocoding, please apply AutoNavi Map API Key. Set amap_key globally following command: get result geocoding, getCoord function. bulk workloads, amapGeocode uses curl-multi parallelism (via {httr2}) applies safe defaults respect AutoNavi’s QPS limit (3 requests/second). can tune concurrency/throttling amap_config(). response get AutoNavi Map API JSON XML. readability, transform tibble, setting output argument tibble default. anyone want get response JSON XML, just set output = "JSON" output = "XML". anyone want extract information JSON XML, result can parsed extractCoord. extractCoord created get result tibble.
code: options(amap_key = 'REPLACE THIS BY YOUR KEY') library(amapGeocode)  # Defaults are safe, but you can set them explicitly amap_config(throttle = TRUE, max_active = 3)  res <- getCoord('四川省博物馆') knitr::kable(res) res <-   getCoord('四川省博物馆', output = 'XML') res res tb <-    extractCoord(res) knitr::kable(tb)

title: Introduction to amapGeocode
text: get result reverse geocoding, getLocation function. extractLocation created get result tibble.
code: # Safe defaults for bulk requests amap_config(throttle = TRUE, max_active = 3)  res <- getLocation(104.043284, 30.666864) knitr::kable(res) res <-    getLocation(104.0339, 30.66069, output = 'XML') res tb <-    extractLocation(res) knitr::kable(tb)

title: Introduction to amapGeocode
text: get result reverse geocoding, getAdmin function. extractAdmin created get result tibble.
code: res <-    getAdmin('四川省') knitr::kable(res) res <-    getAdmin('四川省', output = 'XML') res res tb <-    extractAdmin(res) knitr::kable(tb)

title: An Interface to the AutoNavi Maps API Geocoding Services
text: Geocoding Reverse Geocoding Services widely used provide data coordinate location information, including longitude, latitude, formatted location name, administrative region different levels. packages can provide geocode service tidygeocoder, baidumap, baidugeo. However, always provide precise information China, unavailable upgrade backend API. amapGeocode built provide high precise geocoding reverse geocoding service, provides interface AutoNavi(高德) Maps API geocoding services. API docs can found . two main functions use, one getCoord() needs character location name input, one getLocation() needs two numeric longitude latitude values inputs. getCoord() function extracts coordinate information input character location name outputs results tibble, XML JSON (list). getLocation() function extracts location information input numeric longitude latitude values outputs results tibble, XML JSON (list). tibble format output, ’s highly readable can used alternative data.frame amapGeocode inspired baidumap baidugeo. want choose Baidu Map API, packages good choices. However, AutoNavi significant high precise, case, Results Baidu unsatisfactory.

title: An Interface to the AutoNavi Maps API Geocoding Services
text: Unified HTTP handling via {httr2} structured diagnostics (amap_api_error) automatic propagation rate-limit headers. Opt-request signing amap_sign(), with_amap_signature(), amap_config() keeps sensitive secrets function calls. getCoord() supports mode = "" multi-match lookups batch = TRUE native AutoNavi 10---time batching. getLocation() supports native batching plus rich POI, road, intersection, AOI list-columns via details argument extensions = "". Bulk requests executed httr2::req_perform_parallel() (curl multi; new R sessions) protected default throttling (3 requests/second). Tune amap_config(). extractAdmin() traverses every matching parent region, returning tidy parent metadata optional boundary polylines extensions = "".

title: An Interface to the AutoNavi Maps API Geocoding Services
text: can install released version amapGeocode CRAN : install development version, run following command:
code: install.packages("amapGeocode") remotes::install_github('womeimingzi11/amapGeocode')

title: An Interface to the AutoNavi Maps API Geocoding Services
text: start geocoding reverse geocoding, please apply AutoNavi Map API Key. Set amap_key globally following command: get results geocoding, getCoord function. Retrieve every candidate single query: responses get AutoNavi Map API JSON XML. readability, transform tibble, setting output argument tibble default. want extract information JSON XML. results can parsed extractCoord. extractCoord created get result tibble.
code: library(amapGeocode)  # Respect AutoNavi's documented QPS limit (defaults are already safe).  - # throttling: 3 req/s - max_active: 3 concurrent requests amap_config(throttle = TRUE, max_active = 3)  # An individual request res <- getCoord("四川省博物馆") knitr::kable(res)  # Batch requests - batch=TRUE uses AutoNavi's native batch mode (up to 10 # addresses per HTTP request) - the package may still issue multiple HTTP # requests when you have >10 inputs; those requests are executed via curl-multi # parallelism (no new R sessions) res <- getCoord(c("四川省博物馆", "成都市博物馆", "四川省成都市武侯区金楠天街"),     batch = TRUE) knitr::kable(res)  # Optional tuning (only increase if your key allows it) amap_config(throttle = # list(rate = 6, fill_time_s = 1), max_active = 6) getCoord("四川省博物馆", mode = "all") # An individual request res <- getCoord("四川省博物馆", output = "JSON") res tb <- extractCoord(res) knitr::kable(tb)

title: An Interface to the AutoNavi Maps API Geocoding Services
text: get results reverse geocoding, getLocation function. Request extended POI, road, AOI details (requires extensions = ""): extractLocation created get result tibble.
code: res <- getLocation(103.996, 30.6475) knitr::kable(res) getLocation(103.9960, 30.6475,            extensions = "all",            details = c("pois", "roads", "roadinters", "aois"))

title: An Interface to the AutoNavi Maps API Geocoding Services
text: get results reverse geocoding, getAdmin function. difference getAdmin function, matter output argument tibble , result won’t jointed table different parent administrative region. example, output = tibble, lower level administrative region Province Province B bound one tibble, respectively. table province table province B won’t bound . function supports different administrative region levels, nonsense bind results. Include boundary polylines (requires extensions = ""): extractAdmin created get results tibble.
code: res <- getAdmin(c("四川省", "成都市", "济宁市")) knitr::kable(res) getAdmin("四川省", subdistrict = 0,          extensions = "all", include_polyline = TRUE)

title: An Interface to the AutoNavi Maps API Geocoding Services
text: AutoNavi’s enterprise endpoints can secured digital signature. Instead threading signature every call, enable signing globally: temporary scopes, wrap workflow with_amap_signature():
code: amap_config(secret = "YOUR-SECRET") getCoord("四川省博物馆") with_amap_signature("YOUR-SECRET", {   amap_config(throttle = TRUE, max_active = 3)   getCoord("四川省博物馆", batch = TRUE) })

text: Maintainer: Han Chen chenhan28@gmail.com contributors: Wanyanhan Jiang 243016042@qq.com [contributor]

title: Configure Amap settings — amap_config
text: Configure Amap settings

title: Configure Amap settings — amap_config
code: amap_config(   signature = NULL,   secret = NULL,   key = NULL,   enabled = TRUE,   max_active = NULL,   throttle = NULL )

title: Configure Amap settings — amap_config
text: signature Optional. Signature configuration. Use `FALSE` disable, single string secret, list. secret Optional. Secret key used request signing. key Optional. Optional API key override signing enabled. enabled Optional. Logical flag enable disable signing. max_active Optional. Maximum number active concurrent HTTP requests bulk operations executed `httr2::req_perform_parallel()`. Defaults 3. throttle Optional. Throttling configuration outgoing HTTP requests. Use `FALSE` disable throttling, `TRUE` enable defaults, list following fields: `enabled` (logical), `rate` (numeric), `capacity` (numeric), `fill_time_s` (numeric), `realm` (character). Defaults safe AutoNavi's QPS limits: `max_active = 3` `throttle = list(rate = 3, fill_time_s = 1)`.

what: Convert coordinates to the AutoNavi system — convertCoord
title: Convert coordinates to the AutoNavi system — convertCoord
text: Convert coordinates AutoNavi system

title: Convert coordinates to the AutoNavi system — convertCoord
code: convertCoord(   locations,   key = NULL,   coordsys = NULL,   sig = NULL,   output = "tibble",   keep_bad_request = TRUE,   ... )

title: Convert coordinates to the AutoNavi system — convertCoord
text: locations Required. Coordinate string(s) convert. Accepts character vector. key Optional. AutoNavi API key. can also set globally via `options(amap_key = "-key")`. coordsys Optional. Source coordinate system (`gps`, `mapbar`, `baidu`, `autonavi`). sig Optional. Manual digital signature. workflows can enable automatic signing via [with_amap_signature()] [amap_config()]. output Optional. Output data structure. Supported values `"tibble"` (default), `"JSON"`, `"XML"`. keep_bad_request Optional. `TRUE` (default) API errors converted placeholder rows batched workflows continue. `FALSE` errors raised `amap_api_error` conditions. ... Optional. Included forward compatibility .

title: Convert coordinates to the AutoNavi system — convertCoord
text: `output = "tibble"`, `tibble` columns `lng` `lat` returned. table preserves input order gains `rate_limit` attribute containing rate limit headers returned API. `output` `"JSON"` `"XML"`, parsed body returned without processing.

title: Convert coordinates to the AutoNavi system — convertCoord
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ convertCoord("116.481499,39.990475", coordsys = "gps") } # }

title: Extract subordinate administrative regions from a district response — extractAdmin
text: res Required. Response object returned [getAdmin()] `output = "JSON"` AutoNavi district API. include_polyline Logical indicating whether include polyline column (requires `extensions = ""`). Defaults `FALSE`.

title: Extract subordinate administrative regions from a district response — extractAdmin
text: `tibble` describing administrative region present response. table includes parent metadata (`parent_name`, `parent_adcode`, `parent_level`), centre coordinates (`lng`, `lat`), `depth` column describing nesting level (0 matched region, 1+ subregions). results present single placeholder row filled `NA` values returned.

what: Get subordinate administrative regions from keywords — getAdmin
title: Get subordinate administrative regions from keywords — getAdmin
text: Get subordinate administrative regions keywords

title: Get subordinate administrative regions from keywords — getAdmin
code: getAdmin(   keywords,   key = NULL,   subdistrict = NULL,   page = NULL,   offset = NULL,   extensions = NULL,   filter = NULL,   callback = NULL,   output = "tibble",   keep_bad_request = TRUE,   include_polyline = FALSE,   ... )

title: Get subordinate administrative regions from keywords — getAdmin
text: keywords Required. Search keywords. Accepts character vector; element queried turn. key Optional. AutoNavi API key. can also set globally via `options(amap_key = "-key")`. subdistrict Optional. Subordinate administrative depth (0-3). Defaults API's behaviour. page Optional. Page number multiple pages available. offset Optional. Maximum records per page (maximum 20). extensions Optional. Either `"base"` `""`. Required polyline data. filter Optional. Filter designated administrative divisions (adcode). callback Optional. JSONP callback. supplied, raw response string returned. output Optional. Output data structure. Supported values `"tibble"` (default), `"JSON"`, `"XML"`. keep_bad_request Optional. `TRUE` (default) API errors converted placeholder rows batched workflows continue. `FALSE` errors raised `amap_api_error` conditions. include_polyline Optional. `TRUE`, request made `extensions = ""`, polyline strings included parsed output. ... Optional. Included forward compatibility .

title: Get subordinate administrative regions from keywords — getAdmin
text: `output = "tibble"`, `tibble` containing administrative region details returned. table preserves input order includes parent metadata (`parent_name`, `parent_adcode`, `parent_level`) `depth` column describing nesting level. `rate_limit` attribute attached rate limit headers present. `output` `"JSON"` `"XML"`, parsed body returned without processing.

title: Get subordinate administrative regions from keywords — getAdmin
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ getAdmin("Sichuan Province", subdistrict = 1)  # Include polylines (requires extensions = "all") getAdmin("Sichuan Province",   subdistrict = 1,   extensions = "all", include_polyline = TRUE ) } # }

title: Get coordinate from location — getCoord
text: Get coordinate location

title: Get coordinate from location — getCoord
code: getCoord(   address,   key = NULL,   city = NULL,   sig = NULL,   output = "tibble",   callback = NULL,   keep_bad_request = TRUE,   mode = c("best", "all"),   batch = FALSE,   ... )

title: Get coordinate from location — getCoord
text: address Required. Structured address information. value can character vector; element queried turn. key Optional. AutoNavi API key. can also set globally via `options(amap_key = "-key")`. city Optional. City hint narrows search scope. `batch = TRUE`, single city value supported. sig Optional. Digital signature supplied manually. users instead enable automatic signing via [with_amap_signature()] [amap_config()]. output Optional. Output data structure. Supported values `"tibble"` (default), `"JSON"`, `"XML"`. callback Optional. JSONP callback. supplied raw body returned character vector. keep_bad_request Optional. `TRUE` (default) API errors converted placeholder rows vectorised batched workflows continue. `FALSE` errors raised `amap_api_error` conditions. mode Optional. Controls geocode candidates returned. Use `"best"` (default) keep highest ranked candidate query `""` return matches alongside ranking metadata. batch Optional. `TRUE`, requests chunked groups ten addresses using API's batch mode. Bulk requests executed `httr2::req_perform_parallel()` (curl multi; additional R sessions) protected throttling configured via [amap_config()]. ... Optional. Included forward compatibility .

title: Get coordinate from location — getCoord
text: `output = "tibble"`, `tibble` containing geocode results returned. table preserves input order gains `rate_limit` attribute containing rate limit headers returned API. `mode = ""`, additional metadata columns (`query`, `query_index`, `match_rank`) included. `output` `"JSON"` `"XML"`, parsed body returned without processing.

title: Get coordinate from location — getCoord
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Basic lookup (best match only) getCoord("IFS Chengdu")  # Retrieve all candidates for a single query getCoord("LOS ANGELES", mode = "all")  # Batch ten addresses at a time getCoord(rep("Chengdu IFS", 12), batch = TRUE)  # Temporarily enable automatic request signing with_amap_signature("your-secret", getCoord("IFS Chengdu")) } # }

title: Get location from coordinate — getLocation
text: Get location coordinate

title: Get location from coordinate — getLocation
code: getLocation(   lng,   lat,   key = NULL,   poitype = NULL,   radius = NULL,   extensions = NULL,   roadlevel = NULL,   sig = NULL,   output = "tibble",   callback = NULL,   homeorcorp = 0,   keep_bad_request = TRUE,   batch = FALSE,   details = NULL,   ... )

title: Get location from coordinate — getLocation
text: lng Required. Longitude decimal degrees. Can numeric vector. lat Required. Latitude decimal degrees. Must length `lng`. key Optional. AutoNavi API key. can also set globally via `options(amap_key = "-key")`. poitype Optional. Return nearby POI types. meaningful `extensions = ""`. radius Optional. Search radius metres (0-3000). extensions Optional. Either `"base"` (default) `""` request extended detail payloads. roadlevel Optional. Road level filter. applies `extensions = ""`. sig Optional. Manual digital signature. workflows can enable automatic signing via [with_amap_signature()] [amap_config()]. output Optional. Output format. Supported values `"tibble"` (default), `"JSON"`, `"XML"`. callback Optional. JSONP callback. supplied raw response string returned. homeorcorp Optional. Optimise POI ordering: `0` (default) none, `1` home-centric, `2` corporate-centric ordering. keep_bad_request Optional. `TRUE` (default) API errors converted placeholder rows batched workflows continue. `FALSE` errors raised `amap_api_error` conditions. batch Optional. `TRUE`, requests chunked groups ten coordinates using API's batch mode. Bulk requests executed `httr2::req_perform_parallel()` (curl multi; additional R sessions) protected throttling configured via [amap_config()]. details Optional. Character vector describing extended list-columns include parsed output. Supported values `"pois"`, `"roads"`, `"roadinters"`, `"aois"`. Use `""` include every detail payload. Defaults `NULL`, omits nested payloads. ... Optional. Included forward compatibility .

title: Get location from coordinate — getLocation
text: `output = "tibble"`, `tibble` one row per coordinate returned. table preserves input order gains `rate_limit` attribute containing rate limit headers returned API. `details` requested, corresponding list-columns (`pois`, `roads`, `roadinters`, `aois`) contain nested `tibble` objects. `output` `"JSON"` `"XML"`, parsed body returned without processing.

title: Get location from coordinate — getLocation
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ getLocation(104.043284, 30.666864)  # Request extended POI details getLocation(104.043284, 30.666864,   extensions = "all", details = "pois" )  # Batch reverse-geocode ten points at a time lngs <- rep(104.043284, 12) lats <- rep(30.666864, 12) getLocation(lngs, lats, batch = TRUE) } # }

title: amapGeocode 0.9.0
text: CRAN release: 2026-01-19 Added Shiny Graphical User Interface (GUI) accessible via amap_gui(). interface supports single batch operations geocoding, reverse geocoding, coordinate conversion, along API configuration. Switched default tabular outputs tibble tidyverse helpers. Refined documentation align new outputs pkgdown Bootstrap 5. Improved error handling consistency example stability.

title: amapGeocode 0.8.0
text: Migrated HTTP stack {httr2}, unifying retries, diagnostics, rate-limit metadata via amap_request() amap_api_error. Added request signing helpers (amap_sign(), with_amap_signature(), amap_config()) simplify secure integrations. getCoord() now supports mode = "" multi-match results batch = TRUE 10---time requests, extractCoord() returning stable columns. getLocation() gains batching plus optional POI/road/AOI list-columns new details argument extractLocation(). extractAdmin() iterates multiple parents can emit boundary polylines include_polyline = TRUE. Test suite migrated offline {vcr}/{httptest2} fixtures covering multi-result, extensions, error scenarios.

title: amapGeocode 0.7.0
text: Since 0.7.0, Version R 4.1.0 support anymore.
